00099   GMM() :
00100       gaussians(0),
00101       dimensionality(0),
00102       localFitter(FittingType()),
00103       fitter(localFitter)
00104   {
00105     // Warn the user.  They probably don't want to do this.  If this constructor
00106     // is being used (because it is required by some template classes), the user
00107     // should know that it is potentially dangerous.
00108     Log::Debug << "GMM::GMM(): no parameters given; Estimate() may fail "
00109         << "unless parameters are set." << std::endl;
00110   }
